text: magar (haan) jin musharikon se tumane ehado paimaan kiya tha phir un logon ne bhee kabhee kuchh tumase (vafa ehad mein) kamee nahin kee aur na tumhaare muqaabale mein kisee kee madad kee ho to unake ehad va paimaan ko jitanee muddt ke vaaste muqarrar kiya hai poora kar do khuda parahezagaaron ko yaqeenan dost rakhata hai
